description: This easy granola comes together in minutes and can be made with any nut or seed you have to hand.
name: Coconut, Date & Vanilla Granola Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 150°C/130°C fan-forced and line two large baking trays with parchment.
Mix all the dry ingredients together in a large bowl.
Whisk the olive oil, maple syrup and vanilla together in a small bowl and pour over the dry ingredients, mixing well.
Divide the mixture into two batches and spread half between two baking trays, bake for 15 minutes, stir and return to the oven for a further 10 minutes.
Repeat the above with the second batch. Allow the granola to cool completely, break up any large clusters and serve.
